summary.span: Provides a base control designer class for extending the design-mode behavior of a Web server control.

span.span: Provides a base control designer class for extending the design-mode behavior of a Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供基控件设计器类可以继承自和扩展提供设计时支持的 Web 服务器控件在设计宿主中，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。The class provides a base control designer class that can be inherited from and extended to provide design-time support for a Web server control in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 使用设计时呈现的对象模型是改进了对早期版本中，使用以下新基类提供简化的对象模型的访问权限：The object model for working with design-time rendering is improved over earlier versions, with the following new base classes to provide access to the simplified object model: - 这并不新鲜，但得到了显著改善。, which is not new, but has been greatly improved. - 。. - 。. ## 自动格式设置Automatic Formatting 可以创建各种可简化过程的页面开发人员要将复杂的样式更改应用到自定义 Web 服务器控件的自动和预定义格式。You can create a variety of automatic and pre-defined formats that can simplify the process of page developers who are applying complex style changes to custom Web server controls. 例如，控件，它派生自类中，提供了许多可供选择的自动格式。For example, the control, which derives from the class, provides many automatic formats from which to choose. 若要实现，并提供自定义控件中自动设置格式，使用以下功能：To implement and provide automatic formatting in your custom controls, use the following features: - 属性。The property. - 方法。The method. - 类。The class. - 类。The class. ## 操作列出 （智能标记）Action Lists (Smart Tags) 操作列表是菜单的重要或广泛使用的页开发人员使用的控件可以在设计时用户界面 (UI) 中执行的任务如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。Action lists are menus of important or widely used tasks that a page developer who uses a control can perform in a design-time user interface (UI), such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 例如，您的控件的设计时视图无法提供可用任务的菜单。For example, the design-time view of your control could provide a menu of available tasks. 这包括任务，以自动设置控件的格式。This includes a task to format the control automatically. 若要了解有关操作列表，启动具有以下功能：To learn about action lists, start with the following features: - 属性。The property. - 类。The class. - 方法。The method. - 类。The class. - 类。The class. - 类。The class. ## 控件设计器区域Control Designer Regions 区域是 Web 服务器控件的设计时视图中可编辑区域。Regions are editable areas in the design-time view of a Web server control. 此功能提供了类似所见即所得的设计时编辑的模板内容、 内部控件和属性。This feature offers WYSIWYG-like editing of the template content, inner controls, and properties at design time. 你可以在区域中创建控件的控件设计器，也可以使用工具箱拖放到区域的控件。You can have the control designer create controls in regions or you can use the Toolbox to drag and drop controls into regions. 区域管理具有以下功能：Regions are managed with the following features: - 方法。The method. - 类。The class. - 类。The class. - 方法。The method. - 方法。The method. ## 模板Templates 为设计时编辑的模板化控件，如创建 UI 模型控件，得到了显著改善从早期版本。The model for creating a UI for design-time editing of templated controls, such as the control, has been greatly improved from earlier versions. 可以创建复杂的自定义控件，其中包含模板的各个部件的控件，并自定义控件设计器可帮助页面开发人员要修改模板具有以下功能：You can create complex custom controls that include templates for various parts of the control, and your custom control designer can help page developers who are modifying templates with the following features: - 属性。The property. - 属性。The property. - 类。The class. ## 设计时呈现Design-Time Rendering 类具有以下方法来支持 Web 服务器控件的设计时呈现。The class has the following methods to support design-time rendering of the Web server control. 大多数这些方法都与早期版本中的相同：Most of these methods are the same as in earlier versions: - 方法。The method. - 方法。The method. - 方法。The method. - 方法。The method. - 方法。The method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建简单的设计器类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple designer class that derives from the class. 此控件设计器支持自定义`TextControl`类，并提供在设计时更改控件的文本大小的命令。This control designer supports a custom `TextControl` class and provides a command to change the text size of a control at design time. 通过指定控件设计器中的与控件关联的控件设计器是对象上声明`TextControl`类。The control designer is associated with the control by specifying the control designer in a object declaration on the `TextControl` class. 中找到的 HTML 标记，向控件设计器从持久保存属性更改的关键`ToggleTextSize`方法的自定义`ActionList`类。The key to persisting property changes from the control designer to the HTML markup is found in the `ToggleTextSize` method of the custom `ActionList` class. 若要试用示例中，添加对 System.Design.dll 程序集的引用和编译代码。To try the example, add a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly and compile the code. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来创建在设计时显示错误消息的控件的 HTML 标记。Use the method to create HTML markup to display an error message for a control at design time. 值为`errorMessage`指定在设计时显示给控件的用户的已本地化的字符串。The value for `errorMessage` specifies a localized string that is displayed to the user of the control at design time. 类实现方法返回包含两个行的表，如下所示：The class implementation of the method returns a table with two rows, as follows: - 第一行包含类型名称和站点名称属性的对象。The first row contains the type name and site name for the property of the object. - 第二行包含输入的错误消息字符串。The second row contains the input error message string. 若要生成相关联的异常的错误消息的 HTML 标记，请使用重载。To generate HTML markup for an error message with an associated exception, use the overload. 若要生成异常的 HTML 标记，而无需指定本地化的错误消息，请使用方法。To generate HTML markup for an exception without specifying a localized error message, use the method.

span.para: 重载在功能上等效于调用方法使用设置为 e 。
The overload is functionally equivalent to calling the method with e set to .

summary.span: Provides a simple rectangular placeholder representation that displays the type and ID of the control.

span.span: Provides a simple rectangular placeholder representation that displays the type and ID of the control.

span.para: 典型的设计模式是尝试获取通过关联控件的 HTML 标记，如果遇到错误，然后调用方法。如果由控件返回未标记，则调用方法，如果它不重写以提供特定的标记，调用方法，其中应包含类型和控件 ID 的信息。

The typical design pattern is to try to get HTML markup through the associated control, and then if an error is encountered, call the method. If no markup is returned by the control, call the method, which if it is not overridden to provide specific markup, calls the method, which should contain information about the type and ID of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现方法通知由设计宿主属性的`component`，更改关联的控件中发生，并且如果更改未取消由设计宿主中，将调用指定`callback`使用指定`context`，，然后通知设计宿主更改已完成。The implementation of the method notifies the design host, which is determined by the property of `component`, that a change is occurring in the associated control and, if the change is not canceled by the design host, invokes the specified `callback` using the specified `context`, and then notifies the design host that the change has completed. 如果设计宿主或关联的控件引发一个静态`Canceled`异常的字段异常，该事务被取消而无需调用`callback`。If the design host or the associated control throws a static `Canceled` exception field of a exception, the transaction is canceled without invoking `callback`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用简单的复合控件和一个控件，以及要设置标签文本、 属性以及， ，和的属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple composite control with a and a control, together with properties to set the label text, and also the , , and properties of the control. 关联的控件设计器类创建了三个命令，其中每个设置在控件的两个属性。An associated control designer class creates three commands, each of which sets two properties on the control. 通过使用方法，例如上，您可以使用设计宿主的撤消功能[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]、 回滚作为一个单元的每个已完成的事务。By using the method, you can use the undo functionality of the design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], to roll back each completed transaction as a unit. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次克隆项时，可能有一些内部数据结构，如`meta:`应由控件设计器包含在克隆的控件的属性。Whenever an item is cloned, there might be some internal data structures, such as `meta:` attributes, that should be included in the cloned control by the control designer. 页面开发人员可能会添加`meta:`属性到控件的标记，并且那里没有方法，也没有控件来区分这些标记可能的原因。A page developer might add `meta:` attributes to the markup of a control and there is no way, nor is there a reason, for the control to distinguish what those tags might be. 因此，如果控件设计器提供了一种方法将更改应用到一个页面之前编辑的复杂属性或格式，您将创建该控件的克隆，将原始控件和克隆传递给此方法，然后，当所做的更改保存到该标记，所有`meta:`属性也将永久保存。Therefore, if your control designer provides a way to edit complex properties or formats before applying changes to a page, you would create a clone of the control, pass both the original control and the clone to this method, and then, when the changes are persisted to the tag, all `meta:` attributes are also persisted.

value.span: 如果控件设计器使用控件的临时副本进行设计时预览，则为 ；否则，即如果控件设计器为控件设计器中包含的控件使用 属性，则为 。

span.span: , if the control designer uses a temporary copy of the control for design-time preview; otherwise, , if the control designer uses the property for the control contained in the control designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`，则属性将返回该控件的临时副本。If the property is `true`, the property returns a temporary copy of the control. 对临时控件的更改不会保留到文档。Changes to the temporary control are not persisted to the document. 如果属性是`false`，则属性返回的实例的控件属性。If the property is `false`, the property returns an instance of the property for the control. 更改控件的实例保留。Changes to the instance of the control are persisted. 中设置对象用于设置的值属性。The setting in the object is used to set the value of the property. 因此，设置将确定返回的控件的类型属性中的类。Therefore, the setting determines the type of control that is returned by the property in the base class. 如果未在控件设计器声明中，指定对象的行为等同于指定属性设置为`false`。If the is not specified in the control designer declaration, the object behavior is equivalent to specifying the property as `false`.

span.para: 派生自的自定义设计器类可以重写属性，并忽略对象。通常情况下，若要指示属性始终返回控件的临时副本，请重写属性始终返回。若要指示属性始终返回控件的实例，请重写属性始终返回。例如，类派生自，并始终返回为属性。

Custom designers that are derived from the class can override the property and ignore the object. Generally, to indicate that the property always returns a temporary copy of the control, override the property to always return . To indicate that the property always returns an instance of the control, override the property to always return . For example, the class derives from the and always returns for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用属性来确定它的返回值。The property uses the property to determine its return value. 如果属性是`true`，则属性将返回该控件的临时副本。If the property is `true`, the property returns a temporary copy of the control. 对临时控件的更改不会保留。Changes to the temporary control are not persisted. 如果属性是`false`，则属性返回的实例的控件属性。If the property is `false`, the property returns an instance of the property for the control. 更改控件的实例保留。Changes to the instance of the control are persisted. 中设置对象用于设置的值属性。The setting in the object is used to set the value of the property. 因此，设置将确定返回的控件的类型属性中的类。Therefore, the setting determines the type of control that is returned by the property in the base class. 如果未在控件设计器声明中，指定对象的行为等同于指定属性设置为`false`。If the is not specified in the control designer declaration, the object behavior is equivalent to specifying the property as `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将标记与控件设计器属性。The following code example demonstrates how to mark a control designer with the attribute. 该代码示例从 Web 服务器控件从类并将该控件相关联的自定义控件设计器实现。The code example derives a Web server control from the class and associates the control with a custom control designer implementation. 控件设计器类声明将标有`SupportsPreviewControl`属性设置为`true`。The control designer class declaration is marked with the `SupportsPreviewControl` attribute set to `true`. 控件设计器将重写方法，然后显示以斜体显示在设计时控件的属性。The control designer overrides the method, and then displays the property of the control in italic at design time.
